title: Requires persons in parental relation with a child of elementary school age to attend parent support instruction programs
summary: Requires persons in parental relation with a child of elementary school age to attend parents support programs; completion of four workshops one of which shall be related to physical, emotional and sexual abuse of children, shall be a requirement for the child's advancement to seventh grade.

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring  persons  in
         parental  relation  with  a  child  of elementary school age to attend
         parent support programs

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subdivision  2  of  section  3212 of the education law is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph f to read as follows:
    3    F. SHALL, AT THE TIME SUCH INDIVIDUAL BEGINS TO ATTEND  UPON  INSTRUC-
    4  TION,  PARTICIPATE  IN  A  SERIES  OF  FOUR  PARENT  SUPPORT INSTRUCTION
    5  PROGRAMS PURSUANT TO SECTION THREE HUNDRED  NINETEEN  OF  THIS  CHAPTER,
    6  SUCH PROGRAMS TO BE COMPLETED PRIOR TO SUCH INDIVIDUAL'S GRADUATION FROM
    7  SIXTH GRADE AND SHALL BE A REQUIREMENT FOR SUCH INDIVIDUAL'S ADVANCEMENT
    8  TO  THE  SEVENTH GRADE.  WHERE SUCH PERSONS IN PARENTAL RELATION REQUIRE
    9  LEAVE FROM WORK  TO  ATTEND  AND  PARTICIPATE  IN  SUCH  PARENT  SUPPORT
   10  INSTRUCTION PROGRAMS, THE EMPLOYERS OF SUCH PERSONS IN PARENTAL RELATION
   11  SHALL  PROVIDE  SUCH PERSONS WITH ONE DAY PER YEAR OF PAID JOB LEAVE FOR
   12  THIS PURPOSE.
   13    S 2. The education law is amended by adding a new section 319 to  read
   14  as follows:
   15    S  319. PARENT SUPPORT INSTRUCTION. THE COMMISSIONER SHALL, WITHIN ONE
   16  HUNDRED EIGHTY DAYS OF THE  EFFECTIVE  DATE  OF  THIS  SECTION,  AND  IN
   17  CONSULTATION  WITH  THE  BOARD  OF  REGENTS,  DEVELOP GUIDELINES FOR THE
   18  CONTENT AND DISTRIBUTION OF A SERIES OF TWELVE PARENTING WORKSHOPS,  ONE
   19  OF  WHICH  SHALL RELATE TO THE SUBJECT OF PHYSICAL, EMOTIONAL AND SEXUAL
   20  ABUSE OF CHILDREN. PURSUANT TO PARAGRAPH F OF SUBDIVISION TWO OF SECTION
   21  THIRTY-TWO HUNDRED TWELVE OF THIS CHAPTER, THE  COMPLETION  OF  FOUR  OF
   22  SUCH  WORKSHOPS, ONE OF WHICH IS THE PROGRAM ON ABUSE, SHALL BE REQUIRED
   23  OF ALL PERSONS IN PARENTAL RELATION WITH A CHILD PRIOR TO  SUCH  CHILD'S
   24  GRADUATION  FROM SIXTH GRADE AND SHALL BE A REQUIREMENT FOR SUCH CHILD'S
